item.title: GUMI 10th Anniversary Original Megane Stand now Up for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Here we come come with some more merchandise for GUMI ‘s 10th Anniversary! This acrylic stand is absolutely adorable and will nicely store any of your beloved glasses! GUMI Keeping Glasses for You! Any one who owns glasses would love to see their favorite character wearing it and storing it for them, and we are …

The post GUMI 10th Anniversary Original Megane Stand now Up for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Here we come come with some more merchandise for GUMI ‘s 10th Anniversary! This acrylic stand is absolutely adorable and will nicely store any of your beloved glasses!

GUMI Keeping Glasses for You!

Any one who owns glasses would love to see their favorite character wearing it and storing it for them, and we are sure even GUMI fans would love to do, then why don’t we have a look at this awesome acrylic stand they introduced few hours ago?

Having a size of 170 x 240mm, this stand will look awesomely with your glasses on it! It is only priced 4,800 JPY and will release on August 29th via Amazon Japan!

Are you interested perhaps? Then click here to pre-order yours!

Please remember you might need some help to get this item outside Japan!

Giveaway on Twitter

But there is more for those that follow her on Twitter! They are also holding a campaign over there, and you might be able to win one of three of those stands for yourself!

GUMI誕生10周年記念オリジナルメガネスタンドを8/29に発売発売を記念してメガネスタンドを3名様にプレゼント

1. @GUMIfromMegpoid をフォロー
2. この投稿をRT
3. 当選者様にはDMでご連絡

応募締切は8/28
ご応募をお待ちしていますhttps://t.co/54gis576Ch#GUMI#Megpoid#メグッポイド pic.twitter.com/o4HD4EJrrH

— GUMI from Megpoid (@GUMIfromMegpoid) August 23, 2019

Participating is fairly simple:

  1. Follow GUMI on her official Twitter account.
  2. Retweet their campaign tweet above.

The deadline is August 28th and winners will be contacted through Twitter’s DM, so keep your eyes wide open!

Source

Show off you love for this adorable Virtual Singer and fill your life by bringing more of her merchandise at home! There were many other items that were previously introduced by Internet Co. Ltd, you can check them out here!

Remember to stay tuned with us on VNN for more exciting news!

You can find GUMI on Facebook and Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaker social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
Official Goods Page

The post GUMI 10th Anniversary Original Megane Stand now Up for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here!
item.dc:creator: vocazn93
item.description:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversary was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary. Contest details 📢VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して #GUMI が歌う🎤オリジナル楽曲を募集❗世界🌏🌎🌍へ向けて全曲配信手続きを実施。（規定有）🗓7/29（月）15時まで。VOCALOID4 Megpoid 最大40%OFFキャンペーンも実施中　https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMI生誕祭2019#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd — VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019 VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this …

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Megpoid‘s 10th anniversary was on June 26th of 2019. The well known Vocaloid music label, VOCALOTRACKS, released an announcement that they will be holding a song contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary.

Contest details

VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して #GUMI が歌うオリジナル楽曲を募集世界へ向けて全曲配信手続きを実施。（規定有）7/29（月）15時まで。VOCALOID4 Megpoid 最大40%OFFキャンペーンも実施中　https://t.co/CXZMEZNTMB #vocaloid#vocalotracks#GUMI生誕祭2019#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/LeAEo3VWhd

— VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) June 27, 2019

VOCALOTRACKS has given many details and specifics about this contest. The requirements for voicebanks are simple, all Megpoid banks are viable. The application dateline is June 26th through July 29th. The songs can either be new and unpublished or not, any genre is welcome. However, if the song is attached to another label and under specific copyright that it may not be able to used elsewhere, is not allowed.

Songs that are on CD’s are allowed, but only if the rights are available. If there are multiple credits to a song, only one person of that song can upload it. Music using anything that isn’t Megpoid is not allowed, even in harmonies or backing vocals.

Song requirements

In this announcement, the page has listed guidelines for what each song should follow. People who enter will need to register an account, giving their name, email and phone number. This rule is only for first time contest entries for VOCALOTRACKS.

The announcement also gives very detailed information about specifics of the song and file that the song will be on. The file must be in .wav format, in 16 bit and up to 44.1 kHz. The song file must be up to 65 megabytes and up to 6 minutes long. The lyrics must also be available in a .txt file. The thumbnail image must be up to 2500 x 2500 pixels, within an aspect ratio of 1:1. It is also the same with the full photo, but it can be varied depending on the site posted.

There must be credits of every person that worked on the song, especially of the copyright holder.

Every person has a limit of 2 songs.

Distribution sites

Pick up songs from the contest will be available  though the following websites in Japan :

  • iTunes
  • Amazon
  • AWA
  • Google
  • KKBOX
  • Line music
  • Mora
  • Spotify
  • Youtube
  • Rekochok
  • others (unlisted)

While overseas will find them through those websites instead:

  • iTunes(International)
  • Amazon
  • eMusic T-Mobile World Wide
  • Google music
  • KKBOX
  • Spotify
  • etc…

Extra notes

The announcement also details extra notes, just for clarification.

Any information regarding anything of the song cannot be changed after the deadline. If you are under 20 years old, you must have parental consent before entering. You must apply for consent, and written consent is allowed. Finally, you need to be able to say if your entry or entries infringe on any copyright.

That is all that the article says, follow VOCALOTRACKS on twitter for more updates about this contest! It is certain many great composers from Japan and all over the world will make amazing entries, be waiting!

With this, all of the Internet Co. Ltd vocaloids are now 40% sale off! Check it out if you are interested!

【最大40%OFF】#VOCALOID Megpoid発売10周年を記念して当社VOCALOIDライブラリを特別価格でご提供ボーカロイドミュージック配信専用レーベル「VOCALOTRACKS」では、#Megpoid が歌う楽曲を募集中今からお求めの上ご応募いただくことも可能https://t.co/btNNq8giPC#GUMI#GUMI誕生祭2019 pic.twitter.com/87Sh8MHIg3

— shopsswjp (@shopsswjp) June 27, 2019

You can find GUMI on Facebook and Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaking social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
Contest page

The post A VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest for Megpoid’s 10th anniversary is Here! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: GraffArt x Megpoid 10th Anniversary 2nd Round of Merchandise Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Yearning for some nice Megpoid goods guys? Well look no more! GraffArt is going to have a second round of their celebrative merchandise very soon! Let’s have a look together! New Goods for the Second Round! You might remember their first batch of GUMI-themed merchandise we talked about not long ago. Well, seems the party …

The post GraffArt x Megpoid 10th Anniversary 2nd Round of Merchandise Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Yearning for some nice Megpoid goods guys? Well look no more! GraffArt is going to have a second round of their celebrative merchandise very soon! Let’s have a look together!

New Goods for the Second Round!

You might remember their first batch of GUMI-themed merchandise we talked about not long ago. Well, seems the party isn’t over and more goods will come on July 6th!

This time we see new can badges, acrylic stands, a phone case and a key case! Here’s a price list of them!

  • Phone Case (iPhone 6/6x/7/8) – 1,980 JPY
  • Chibi Acrylic Stands (5 variants available) – 800 JPY each (picked randomly) or 4.000 JPY the entire box
  • Key Case – 2,980 JPY
  • Can Badge (5 variants available) – 480 JPY each (picked randomly or 2,400 JPY the entire box

Prices do not include taxes!

This merchandise will be available starting from July 6th at GraffArt’s stores in Namba, Akihabara and Nagoya! Click the location to open the map on Google!

Bonus Purchase

Just like last time, everyone that will spend at least 2.160 JPY in Megpoid merchandise at GraffArt stores will also get a special postcard out of the two designs available

Sources

Mre GUMI merchanfise means more love her fans can spread by buying and showing them off! We are absolutely enthusiast of this collaboration and cannot wait for more to eventually come!

Don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for more exciting news about your favorite virtual singers!

You can find GUMI on Facebook and Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaker social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
GraffArt can be found on Twitter as well as their official website.

The post GraffArt x Megpoid 10th Anniversary 2nd Round of Merchandise Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Megpoid 10th Anniversary x GraffArt Shop Collaboration!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Another one of our most favorite virtual singers is slowly getting to her 10th anniversary, our little carrot lover Megpoid from Internet Co. Ltd, and GraffArt will celebrate her important goal with some exclusive merchandise! GUMI’s Merchandise from GraffArt 【10th anniversary】6月26日は「Megpoid」が記念すべき10周年✨10周年記念として、2週連続で新商品を発売いたします！第1弾は「Megpoid」がグラフアートになりました！落書き調の可愛いイラストのグッズです♪購入特典としてポストカードも配布いたします！是非チェックしてください☆#Megpoid pic.twitter.com/oZaSf63oul — GraffArt(グラフアート) (@Graff_Art_) June 5, 2019 In order to celebrate one of the …

The post Megpoid 10th Anniversary x GraffArt Shop Collaboration! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Another one of our most favorite virtual singers is slowly getting to her 10th anniversary, our little carrot lover Megpoid from Internet Co. Ltd, and GraffArt will celebrate her important goal with some exclusive merchandise!

GUMI’s Merchandise from GraffArt

【10th anniversary】
6月26日は「Megpoid」が記念すべき10周年
10周年記念として、2週連続で新商品を発売いたします！
第1弾は「Megpoid」がグラフアートになりました！
落書き調の可愛いイラストのグッズです♪
購入特典としてポストカードも配布いたします！
是非チェックしてください☆#Megpoid pic.twitter.com/oZaSf63oul

— GraffArt(グラフアート) (@Graff_Art_) June 5, 2019

In order to celebrate one of the most iconic virtual singers released during the VOCALOID2 era, GraffArt shop decided to dedicate two entire weeks to her, by bringing GUMI-themed merchandise to their shop! Let’s have a loot at them together!

Items

The products that have been revealed feature a set of cutesy chibi GUMIs in some of her official outfits. Those pastel colors also bring up her sweetest side as a character, the one we learnt to love in the (almost) past ten years!

Although her merchandise only offers a small variety of products, you will absolutely love them! Here is a list of the items they introduced:

  • Chara Pass (Pass Case) – 1,380 JPY
  • Chara Case (Pocket Wallet) – 2,980 JPY
  • Chara Charger N – 4,980 JPY
  • Book-like Smartphone Case (Iphone 6/6s/7/8) – 2,980 JPY

All of the prices do not include tax fees!

Adorable isn’t it? There is no better way to show your undying love for GUMI than having some of her anniversary merchandise!

Collectibles

Along side the products we showed you above, GraffArt will also offer collectibles such as can badges and acrylic keychains!

Both of the products have sis different variants, each for every chibi artworks they made for this collaboration! You can test your luck by buying one, or simply purchase the whole set altogether! Here below you can find the prices:

  • Can Badges (6 variants) – 480 JPY each or 2.880 JPY for the entire box.
  • Acrylic Keychains (6 Variants) – 780 JPY each or 4.680 JPY for the entire box.

Will you be able to get them all with your luck’s aid, or will you purchase them all? No matter the case, it will be absolutely worthy!

Bonus Purchase

Last but not least, everyone that will spend at least 2.180 JPY in Megpoid merchandise at GraffArt stores will also get a special postcard featuring their collaborative artwork!

Locations

This collaboration will begin on June 26th, and is going to be held in three different GraffArt stores! Check the list below and click for the name of the location you want to see the map!

  • GraffArt Shop in Namba
  • GraffArt Shop in Akihabara
  • GraffArt Shop in Nagoya

Sources

We are so excited for GUMI getting a little spark of love for her special anniversary! And you guys? Let us know if you manage to go there and grab something!

Don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN for more exciting news about your favorite virtual singers!

You can find GUMI on Facebook and Twitter
Same goes for Internet Co. Ltd, which also has english-speaker social medias! Find them on Facebook (Japanese/English) or Twitter (Japanese/English).
GraffArt can be found on Twitter as well as their official website.

The post Megpoid 10th Anniversary x GraffArt Shop Collaboration! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Nicocafe x Otomachi Una Collaborative Cafe Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Food and music are probably the best combination of them all, and why don’t mix things together with a collaborative Nicocafe with Otomachi Una? Her music will make an awesome mix with such delicious plates and drinks! Una Ready to Serve! ＼ 音街ウナ×nicocafe 開催決定！／ 5/21(火)よりニコニコ本社にてコラボカフェの開催が決定しました！お席のご予約は本日より以下の予約ページにて承ります。詳細はカフェページをご確認ください。 ▼カフェページhttps://t.co/Zih4pMP5ME▼予約受付ページhttps://t.co/XVNiJYjSWb#音街ウナ pic.twitter.com/CCvSd98Sc1 — ニコニコ本社 (@nicohonsha) May 15, 2019 Our beloved …

The post Nicocafe x Otomachi Una Collaborative Cafe Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Food and music are probably the best combination of them all, and why don’t mix things together with a collaborative Nicocafe with Otomachi Una? Her music will make an awesome mix with such delicious plates and drinks!

Una Ready to Serve!

＼ 音街ウナ×nicocafe 開催決定！／

5/21(火)よりニコニコ本社にてコラボカフェの開催が決定しました！
お席のご予約は本日より以下の予約ページにて承ります。
詳細はカフェページをご確認ください。

▼カフェページhttps://t.co/Zih4pMP5ME
▼予約受付ページhttps://t.co/XVNiJYjSWb#音街ウナ pic.twitter.com/CCvSd98Sc1

— ニコニコ本社 (@nicohonsha) May 15, 2019

Our beloved eel-themed virtual singer will join the party with her special Nicocafe starting from May 21st to June 3rd. She will not not only bring her joyful energy to the cafe with some of her song turned into plates and drinks, but also some adorable merchandise for all of her fans’ enjoyment! Let’s give them a look together!

Drink Menu

We can’t call a cafe a real one until he offer us some nice drinks, don’t you think? Una of course wouldn’t want her guests to feel thirsty, so she gave us an awesome menù!

Each drink costs 700 JPY and, at exception of the first one, is actually based and titled off of some of Una’s most popular songs! Here is the full list of them all!

  • Otomachi Una’s Spicy Drink – (Whip Cream / Butterfly Pea Tea / Pie / Lemon / Jelly)
  • “I’ll Make Kanden” by Carlos Hakamada – (Blue Curacao Syrup / Tapioca / Chocolate / Soda / Whip Cream / Popping Candy)
  • “Like A Love Letter of 365 Days” by mint* – (Soda / Lavender Syrup / Blue Curacao Syrup / Lemon Syrup / Sprinkles / Argent)
  • “Dancing Mr. Dinosaur” by HihumiP – (Milk / Matcha Tea / Pie Whip Cream / Edible Flower)
  • “Prettinkle Sister” by LamazeP – (Strawberry Syrup / Cow Milk / Whip Cream / Wafer)
  • “Hate it! Hate it! Huge Ego!” by KurageP – (Violet Syrup / Soda / Coconut Gel / Whip Cream)

Awesome menu isn’t it? You can also order a drink set, priced 1,200 JPY, that will get you a special A4 clear file folder! (It gets chosen randomly)

Plates

Food is of course there as well, featuring lots of creativity thanks to their reference to some of Una’s popular songs!

  • Sweetly Delicious! Una Parfait – 950 JPY
  • Let’s freely draw! “I wanna be-!” Pancake (Based off of “I wanna be it!” by kinoshita) – 1,200 JPY
  • “ever” plate (Based off of “ever” by Cat Allergy)- 1,100 JPY
  • “I can’t be satisfied with one bite!” Dessert Plate (Based off of “Booo!” by TOKOTOKO) – 950 JPY
  • “Let’s eat a cow (or beef)!” Stamina beef bowl (Based off of “Ushinohi☆Abduction” by cosMo – 1,200 JPY
  • “Grrr!” Beast Pasta (Based off of “Beast Dance” by KurageP) – 1,200 JPY

All of those delicious plates look so much tasty! I would love to try them out myself as well!

Goods

We have a lot of merchandise too of course! All of those goods will be available at nicocafe’s location during the collaboration with Una!

There is something for anyone’s taste, from buttons to some adorable acrylic stands. Let’s have a look!

  • Big Acrylic Stand (Height: 273mm, width: 231mm) – 4,000 JPY
  • Acrylic Stands (6 Variant) – 800 JPY Each
  • Acrylic Keychains with Stands (3 Variants) – 700 JPY Each
  • Buttons (3 Variants) – 400 JPY Each
  • Tote-bag – 1,500 JPY

All prices don’t include VAT fees!

Our little virtual idol gave her best for those goods and it shows. If you manage to attend you should really grab something to bring home!

Special Paper Coasters

Last but not least, there are extra gifts to everyone that orders either a plate or a drink. That’s right! You will get a special paper coaster for each order you make!

There are 13 different designs in total and they are giving them out randomly for each drink and plate you order there.

Will you able to get your favorite ones? Who knows!

Location

This collaborative cafe will be held at Nico Nico Honsha, Below you can see it on the map!

</center)
Want to make a reservation perhaps? Perfect! Just click here and select a date and time!

Sources

As fans of Otomachi Una ourselves, we couldn’t be more excited for this collaboration! She will surely entertain her guests and, if you manage to try out something from her menus, let us know how your experience was!

Don’t forget to stay tuned with us on VNN to never lose any update on your favorite virtual singers!

Otomachi Una is on Facebook and Twitter
Collaboration Page
Tweet about the collaboration

The post Nicocafe x Otomachi Una Collaborative Cafe Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: kokone’s 4th Anniversary Sale and VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
To celebrate kokone‘s 4th anniversary on February 14th, 2018, not only is there a sale on INTERNET Co.‘s website, but another VOCALOTRACKS x kokone contest has been announced! VOCALOID kokone発売4周年を記念して #kokone が歌うオリジナル楽曲を募集！世界へ向けて全曲配信手続きを行います。（規定有）皆様からのご応募をお待ちしています。 https://t.co/j4QVyB0ZF9 #vocaloid pic.twitter.com/hT3cpSo3ZN — VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) February 14, 2018 In commemoration of the 4th anniversary of VOCALOID kokone’s release, we are now accepting …

The post kokone’s 4th Anniversary Sale and VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
To celebrate kokone‘s 4th anniversary on February 14th, 2018, not only is there a sale on INTERNET Co.‘s website, but another VOCALOTRACKS x kokone contest has been announced!

VOCALOID kokone発売4周年を記念して #kokone が歌うオリジナル楽曲を募集！世界へ向けて全曲配信手続きを行います。（規定有）皆様からのご応募をお待ちしています。 https://t.co/j4QVyB0ZF9 #vocaloid pic.twitter.com/hT3cpSo3ZN

— VOCALOTRACKS (@VOCALOTRACKS) February 14, 2018

In commemoration of the 4th anniversary of VOCALOID kokone’s release, we are now accepting original songs sung by #kokone! We will be distributing them all for the world to enjoy (with stipulations). We eagerly await all of your entries. http: // bit.ly/2EnEWMQ  #vocaloid

Sale Details

There is currently a sale on the INTERNET Co. website for 40% off of any of their VOCALOIDs, with the exception of Otomachi Una.

The VOCALOIDs included in the sale are VOCALOID 4 Megpoid and Gakupo, VOCALOID 3 Chika, kokone, CUL, Lily, Megpoid English and Gachapoid. The sale applies to both their digital download and physical boxed versions (including their starter packs). Their boxed versions will even come with a free 8GB USB.

The sale began on 14th February and will run until February 28th, 2018.

To get 40% off on a purchase of one of the above VOCALOIDs, customers must first add the product to their cart and then enter the Coupon Code ‘KOKONE4TH214’ (without quotes) and click the [ クーポン適用 ] (Apply coupon) button.

If you’re interested, you can check out the sale here.

Contest Details

VOCALOTRACKS is hosting a song contest where entrants must submit a song using the VOCALOID 3 kokone vocal library. The winning entries will be distributed by VOCALOTRACKS through various national and international music distributors.

Please note that the songs must meet Internet Co.’s guidelines for character usage in order to be eligible for distribution.

Entry Period

The contest opened on February 14th, 2018, and will end on March 19th, 2018 at 15:00 JST.

Rules

Song entries can be of any genre, and both previously-published and unpublished songs will be accepted.

However, all entries must be original songs that are not contracted or copyrighted to any particular publishing company.

You will not be able to enter in any of the following cases:

  • If you have previously transferred the publishing rights for your song to a recording company, and thus no longer own the rights to the master recording
    (Those that have been assigned an ISRC, be warned)
  • If the lyricist, composer, music writer, etc. are separate individuals, and not every party’s approval for the song’s entry is confirmed
  • If you enter songs that use VOCALOIDs other than those from Internet Co. or the VY series (this includes use in a chorus)
  • As long as there is no exclusivity contract in place, and you still own the rights to the master recording, then VOCALOTRACKS can accept entries for songs that have been previously distributed by another company (in which case they would assign it a new ISRC number). However, if this is the case, there may be some distribution sites that will not accept the entry. Some like the iTunes Store would distribute them as a separate record altogether.

Distribution site list

The winning entries may be distributed via any of the following sites. Please note that only major sites are listed, and that there may be others available.

Domestic distributors/distribution sites

  • iTunes Store
  • Amazon
  • mora
  • GIGA Enta Melody
  • RECOUTA (official record store of RECOCHOKU and more)
  • music.jp
  • MySound
  • dwango.jp
  • GEO ☆ Music Store
  • mumo
  • NHK Melody
  • JOYSOUND
  • TV Asashi Sound
  • TSUTAYA Premium
  • GLOBAL x EXOTICA
  • MUSICO ♪
  • OnGen Uta
  • AITENI Melody
  • KIKI UTA MAX
  • Disney Music
  • Heartful MUSIC
  • MSE ~ Net
  • TBS Melody
  • ZIP Uta ♪
  • RADIMO
  • Music X Movie
  • M2 Star
  • NETSURETSU! Anisong Damashii
  • Artist Official Sounds
  • Fuji TV ♪ Fuji Melo
  • Oricon Style
  • Cinema☆ CHAKU Soundtrack
  • DAM ★ UTA
  • HAPPY! MUSIC
  • UTA JETS!

Overseas distribution sites

  • iTunes
  • amazon
  • eMusic
  • Rhapsody
  • Zune Orange / France Telecom Worldwide
  • Napster Nokia Vodafone Worldwide
  • Beatport Virgin Mobile Worldwide
  • Slacker Bell Mobility
  • Other Music Rogers Wireless
  • SpiralFrog Telus
  • Insound Musiwave
  • T – Online Moderati
  • Spotify Verisign / Mqube
  • Juno 9 Squared
  • Lala Jamster / Jamba
  • Starzik Hudson
  • Virgin Mega Thumbplay
  • FNAC SendMe Mobile
  • Telefonica

How to Enter

Registration

In order to enter the contest, you must first register in advance with your name, contact e-mail and contact phone number. Those who have entered any previous VOCALOTRACKS contest may use their existing registration information.

You can register for the contest here.

Entry Guidelines

Entrants must provide the following:

  • Music (in .wav formart / 16 bit, 44.1 kHz, STEREO); 65 MB max file size (about 6 minutes long)
  • Song lyrics (in .txt format)
  • Thumbnail images* (in .jpg format / 2500 × 2500 pixels / aspect ratio of 1 : 1)
  • Photos* of the artist(s) (in .jpg format / 2500 × 2500 pixels / aspect ratio of 1 : 1 / to be used on the distribution sites)
  • Name of the artist or representing artist if more than one (to be notified by VOCALOTRACKS)
  • Creator’s name (for both lyricist and composer) (We suggest using a name converter if you do not have a Japanese name and are prompted to give your name in kana)
  • Song title
  • Name of the master recording rights holder** (may or may not be displayed on the distribution sites)
  • Name of the copyright holder** (may or may not be displayed on the distribution sites)

*Note that if the thumbnail image or artist photos are not the specified size, VOCALOTRACKS will resize the images themselves. If the aspect ratio is not 1 : 1, blank space can be added along the sides of the image.

**Note that the some distributions sites like iTunes and Amazon MP3 will display the names of the master recording rights and copyright holders.

Number of Entries

Up to 3 entries are allowed per person.

Important Points

  • After the entry deadline, you cannot change your submitted music, thumbnail image, artist photo, creator name, song title, or the names of the master recording rights holders and copyright holders for any reason. Please keep this in mind before you enter.
  • Entrants under the age of 20 must obtain parental or guardian consent for the Entry Guidelines and Important Points. Contest winners who are under the age of 20 may be asked to provide a letter of consent from parents or guardians.
  • Before entering, please ensure that any submitted works do not infringe on any copyrights or the intellectual property rights of any third party.

Winning Entries

  • The contest winners will enter a royalty agreement with VOCALOTRACKS. All rights to the songs will remain with the creators themselves.
  • VOCALOTRACKS may request to make modifications, arrangements, or remastering of the winning songs.
  • VOCALOTRACKS will contact the winners directly via their registered e-mail address.

Source Links

INTERNET Co. kokone’s 4th Anniversay sale page

VOCALOTRACKS x kokone song contest page

The post kokone’s 4th Anniversary Sale and VOCALOTRACKS Song Contest appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Otomachi Una January News Roundup!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
It’s time to head into the second month of 2018 with some Otomachi Una goodness! Towards the end of January, MTK revealed a second set of Una LINE stickers along with some new content for their Niconico Commons page! LINE Stickers For those who couldn’t get enough of the first set of LINE stickers starring the eel-themed …

The post Otomachi Una January News Roundup! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to head into the second month of 2018 with some Otomachi Una goodness! Towards the end of January, MTK revealed a second set of Una LINE stickers along with some new content for their Niconico Commons page!

LINE Stickers

For those who couldn’t get enough of the first set of LINE stickers starring the eel-themed VOCALOID, her second set, featuring Otomachi Una Talk Ex, is now available in the LINE Store for just $0.99 USD!

?【お知らせ】音街ウナLINEスタンプ第2弾でました♪??

今回はウナTalkが登場です♪є(๑☐ᴗ☐ก)э?

よろしくおねがいします♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍https://t.co/rPM8b2pYCS pic.twitter.com/MqvMSX2374

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) January 30, 2018

?【Announcement】Otomachi Una LINE sticker set 2 is here♪??
This time, it’s Una Talk who makes her debut♪є(๑☐ᴗ☐ก)э?
We hope you like them♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍
https://store.line.me/stickershop/product/1931796

Here is a look at all 40 stickers that you can get, along with some captions for those with text to give users a better idea of how each sticker can be used.

Once you’re convinced, click here to visit the purchase page!

Niconico Commons and Togetter Pages

Just before releasing the stickers, Una’s social media informed fans of other new Una content through their page on Togetter, a content curation site that’s popular in Japan. On this page, they collect Tweets and posts from their Niconico Commons page for content that fans can download for free and use for their Una videos!

This is Otomachi Una’s official page for distributing official artwork, video material, wallpapers, and motion-captured data! ♪є(｡´･◎･)｡´_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ

The page offers a plethora of goodies for video creators to use, both Una-related (such as motion capture) and general (like wallpapers). Here are a few highlights.

もーしょんきゃぷちゃーデータ配布させて頂きました♪є(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)э?
【モーキャプ】前転して開脚座りhttps://t.co/gFsH9o4MLf
【モーキャプ】立つ→あぐら→立つhttps://t.co/rYF7ZOo2eS pic.twitter.com/fE3yUfHp4V

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) July 28, 2016

We’re distributing some motion capture data♪є(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)э?
[Mo-cap] Rolling and sitting with legs spread apart
http://3d.nicovideo.jp/works/td27200
[Mo-cap] Standing → Sitting cross-legged → Standing
http://3d.nicovideo.jp/works/td27199

「電車の中のウナ」公式イラストと公式動画を追加しました！
背景のみバージョンもあります！є(｡´･ω･)｡´_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘhttps://t.co/0ingMkzecC pic.twitter.com/G0T7lDKRow

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) September 2, 2016

We’ve added “Una on a train” official artwork and video! There’s also a background-only version! є(｡´･ω･)｡´_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc143094
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc143095
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc143096

先日アップした素材のSpicyバージョンです！є(｡´･ω･)｡´_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ
【公式】電車の中のウナ_Spicy
イラストhttps://t.co/qAMmBLDLsA
動画https://t.co/zpVyuS3rE2 pic.twitter.com/Ehn0RUSz4v

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) September 7, 2016

Here’s the Spicy version of the content that we uploaded the other day є(｡´･ω･)｡´_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ
[Official] Una Spicy in a train
Illustration: commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc143…
Video: commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc143…

このイラストはモデル制作の時の候補の一つです♪є(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)э?? pic.twitter.com/lgYxBtdK4W

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) September 30, 2016

When we were making the models, this illustration was one of the top candidates ♪є(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)э??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc144918

イラストは前回に引きつづきハロウィン衣装です♪є(灬╹ᴗ╹灬)э?? pic.twitter.com/eBwkdA40b1

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) October 7, 2016

Here’s another Halloween costume as a continuation of our last @otomachiuna illustration ♪є(灬╹ᴗ╹灬)э??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc145496

3つの素材を追加しました！??
和風な背景動画とお正月っぽい枠です♪??
よろしければお使いください♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??https://t.co/kmPk7QIPDnhttps://t.co/0K28KZ5qW8 pic.twitter.com/GUsefmiHfx

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) December 16, 2016

We’ve added 3 new pieces of content! ?? A Japanese-style video background and a New Years-esque border ♪?? We hope you enjoying using them ♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc149771
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc149772
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc149773

?TalkExのロゴと動画素材を追加しました！?
透過のTalk?ロゴとライブ??‍?のイメージのループ素材です??
よろしければお使いください♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??https://t.co/kmPk7QIPDnhttps://t.co/0K28KZ5qW8 pic.twitter.com/oDqdvvBDCz

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) March 17, 2017

? We’ve added the TalkEx logo and video material!? Here’s a transparent version of the Talk? logo and several live stage ??‍? video loop??
We hope you enjoy using them ♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc155860
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc155861
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc155862
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc155863
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc155864

先ほどイラスト素材を追加しました！?
TalkExのちびキャラです♪?????
よろしければお使いください♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??https://t.co/0K28KZ5qW8 pic.twitter.com/cYpnMJxCht

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) April 7, 2017

We’ve just now added some artwork, too! ? A chibi TalkEx ♪????? We hope you enjoy using her ♪є(｡･◎･)｡_ _)эﾍﾟｺﾘ??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc157335

> オタマン帽の目と唇の素材が欲しいです！！ヘルメットに貼ったり///

こちら対応させていただきました♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍https://t.co/0K28KZ5qW8https://t.co/HwlmHY427P #odaibako pic.twitter.com/tPNNZyxVOD

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) August 25, 2017

“We want Otaman eyes and lips material！！To stick onto our helmets!///”
To this, we gladly oblige♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc165227
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc165228
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/material/nc165229

今回のアニメ調エフェクトの配布素材はこのような感じです♪є(๑´ᴗ`๑)э??https://t.co/kmPk7QIPDn pic.twitter.com/3sDhLnsGD8

— 音街ウナ公式?4/2新商品発売? (@otomachiuna) January 26, 2018

This time, we’ve added some anime-like effects that appear as you see below ♪є(๑´ᴗ`๑)э??
http://commons.nicovideo.jp/user/upload/3826651

And there is so much more! Head over the Otomachi Una Togetter and Niconico Commons pages to view all that they have!

Stay tuned to VNN for future updates on Una and others!

Information Source

Otomachi Una’s Official Twitter and Facebook

The post Otomachi Una January News Roundup! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
Back in October, Internet Co. revealed the official online goods shop for their eel-themed VOCALOID, Otomachi Una! There was a very limited selection when it first opened – only keychains and fluffy hats – but now the shop offers more goodies based on Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex! Original Goods Note that all prices include …

The post New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Back in October, Internet Co. revealed the official online goods shop for their eel-themed VOCALOID, Otomachi Una! There was a very limited selection when it first opened – only keychains and fluffy hats – but now the shop offers more goodies based on Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex!

Original Goods

Note that all prices include tax. 

Plush Otaman Hat (Sugar): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Plush Otaman Hat (Spicy): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Plush Otaman Hat (Talk Ex): ¥3,980 ($35 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar, Spicy, Talk Ex): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Spicy): ¥700 ($6 USD)

Acrylic Keychain (Talk Ex): ¥700 ($6 USD)

New Goods

Note that all prices include tax.

Plush Doll (Sugar): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)

Plush Doll (Spicy): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)
Plush Doll (Talk Ex): ¥2,400 ($21 USD)

Phone Case (Talk Ex): ¥4,500 ($40 USD)

Able to fit: iPhone 6, iPhone 7 and Multi-form 

Sticker Set (Sugar): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Sticker Set (Spicy): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Sticker Set (Talk Ex): ¥300 ($3 USD)
Sticker Set (Variety): ¥300 ($3 USD)

Where to Buy

All these items are available for immediate purchase on Otomachi Una’s online shop here. Shipping costs ¥700 ($6 USD) per order. However, those living outside of Japan will have to use a forward / proxy service.

Fans can also take advantage of a coupon for orders over ¥1,000 ($9 USD) by friending Una’s LINE account and sending them the message “グッズクーポン” . You can find and scan their QR code here!

Some of the goodies are going fast, so be sure to order them before they’re sold out!

Source: Otomachi Una Official Twitter

The post New Items Available in the Otomachi Una Online Shop! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Otomachi Una TV Commercial Now on YouTube!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
For those have been reading VNN’s coverage of the Otomachi Una TV commercial illustration and song contest, and have been dying to see the finished products for themselves, the wait is finally over! All three variations of the TV commercial are now available for watching on Otomachi Una’s official YouTube channel! The 15-second long commercial …

The post Otomachi Una TV Commercial Now on YouTube! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For those have been reading VNN’s coverage of the Otomachi Una TV commercial illustration and song contest, and have been dying to see the finished products for themselves, the wait is finally over! All three variations of the TV commercial are now available for watching on Otomachi Una’s official YouTube channel!

The 15-second long commercial is being called the “Thank you for my first anniversary” commercial, and comes in three types (A, B, and C). In each one, you can hear Una’s voice saying:

“I’m Otomachi Una. Thank you so much for always making, watching, and listening to so many wonderful creations. VOCALOID 4 Otomachi Una and Otomachi Una Talk Ex are now on sale.”
“UNA!”

What makes each type different, however, is the song that they have playing in the background, and the collection of illustrations that they show (save for the final seven). Below is information on where you can sample and purchase each song, as well as reactions from their respective producers upon hearing them used in the commercials!

Commercial Type A

Song: チョコパフェが食べたいの (Choco Parfait ga Tabetai no, “I Wanna Eat Chocolate Parfait!”)
Producer: 音羽ねぅ (Otoha Neu)

音街ウナTVCMのyoutube版が公開されたようです！
AタイプのCMで「チョコパフェが食べたいの feat.音街ウナ」を使用して頂いています(●´ω｀●)！
他の方の楽曲やイラストもとても素敵なのでよかったら見てみてください！https://t.co/siL4Ahjic0 https://t.co/FWCmvxppT6

— 音羽ねぅ (@neuneu_otoha) November 10, 2017

“The YouTube version of the Otomachi Una commercial is now online!
They used my song “Choco Parfait ga Taibetai no feat. Otomachi Una” in Type A of the commercial (●´ω｀●)！
Everyone else’s songs and illustrations were all splendid as well, so do give it a look when you get the chance!”
http://vocalotracks.ssw.co.jp/product.asp?ano=1886

Sample/Purchase チョコパフェが食べたいの on iTunes

Commercial Type B

Song:　ジャストなお！ (Just Now!)
Producer: シカクドット (Shikaku Dot)

音街ウナTVCMコンテストに拙作「ジャストなう！」が採用されました！https://t.co/JdZFOqQZck pic.twitter.com/ARMgTeyirQ

— シカクドット (@shikaku_dot) September 29, 2017

“My humble entry in the Otomachi Una TV commercial song contest, “Just Now!” will be used for this! https://twitter.com/otomachiuna/status/913690966657081345“

Sample/Purchase ジャストなお！ on iTunes

Commercial Type C

Song: トキメキ☆マイハート (Tokimeki☆My Heart)
Producer: すんぷすん♪ (sunpusun♪)

音街ウナTVCM「おかげさまで1周年」3タイプ https://t.co/1tdiXGF705 @YouTubeさんから
これが！話題のTVCMじゃ！！やっと全編視れた！！！！♡
有り難き！！！✩.*♪(o´∇ `o♡)♪.*✩

— すんє(〃'▽'〃)эぷすん ♪ (@BDHardcorePunks) November 10, 2017

“All 3 types to the ‘Thank you for my first anniversary’ Otomachi Una TV commercial are here https://youtu.be/CEz1V96KStY on @YouTube! This commercial’s the talk of the town, and I watched the whole thing!!!! ♡
Thankees!!! ✩.*♪(o´∇ `o♡)♪.*✩”

Sample/Purchase トキメキ☆マイハート on iTunes

Here are even some reactions from artists who saw their artwork used for the commercial! Be sure to check out Otomachi Una’s official Twitter to see even more!

音街ウナテレビCMのBタイプにて僕のイラストが少しだけ映ってました！いやぁ嬉しいです…！
ありがとうございます！
このコンテストに参加できて良かったです！https://t.co/q1V0gXJm2n pic.twitter.com/JfEBpNjKHY

— りのぷー (@Rino01pu) November 11, 2017

“In Type B of the Otomachi Una commercial, my illustration appeared ever so briefly! Gah, I’m so happy…! Thank you so much! I’m so glad I took part in the contest!”

僕のウナちゃんもちゃっかり掲載されていましたんで探してみてください！ありがたい！そしてウナちゃん可愛いウナーーー！！！！！！ https://t.co/S26SZ95TQ0 pic.twitter.com/jz4DNcLwea

— 1日目東エ06b (@srg4_gb) November 11, 2017

“My Una-chan snuck her way into the commercial. See if you can find her! Thanks! Also, Una-chan is so cute!!!!”

てか凄い今更なんだけど、ウナちゃんのCMで俺のイラストちゃんと使われてたんだね嬉しいε(ˆᴗˆ)з pic.twitter.com/blNUUM5JSc

— アダム・スミレ (@KenO_ada) November 10, 2017

“I know it’s super-late, but I saw that my illustration was used in Una-chan’s commercial, and am just so happy ε(ˆᴗˆ)з”

そーいやついったとかにはまだ上げてなかったので…
音街ウナCMイラコン用に描いてたウナちゃんsです。ほんとウナちゃん可愛いね… pic.twitter.com/ulhIYrXBCB

— 蒼都利音 (@rionoil) November 10, 2017

“Here are the Una-chans that I drew for the Otomachi Una commercial illustration contest. Isn’t Una-chan so cute…”

音街ウナちゃんTVCMがyoutubeで公開されたようなので宣伝

Cタイプの「トキメキ☆マイハート feat.音街ウナ」でイラスト使用して頂いております。とっても嬉しい…本当にありがとうなぎです…！ϵ(*´ω`*)϶ϵ( `･ω･´♪)϶ϵ(*-⊡ω⊡-*)϶https://t.co/3cXeG7qa2S pic.twitter.com/OfbA3MM9Zf

— チアキアマハル (@AmaharuChiaki) November 11, 2017

“I heard that the Otomachi Una TV commercial is now on YouTube, so I thought I’d share.
They used my illustration in Type C of the commercial, the one that plays “Tokimeki☆My Heart.” This makes me so happy… Thank you so much…! ϵ(*´ω`*)϶ϵ( `･ω･´♪)϶ϵ(*-⊡ω⊡-*)϶”

音街ウナちゃんのCMがyoutubeで公開されました！どの曲も素敵だしウナちゃんの声かわいい。ひなたこうの作品はタイプCのだいたい左上に掲載していただきました。改めまして1周年おめでとうございました！https://t.co/0RX1HXYtcM#音街ウナ　#ひなたこうファンアート　#イラスト　#ライブ pic.twitter.com/ezA7AEtjFV

— ひなた こう＊クリコレ 150-1,2 (@Hinata_ko_i) November 10, 2017

“Otomachi Una-chan’s commercial is now on YouTube! Una’s voice is so wonderful and cute in every song that she sings. My illustration appears mainly in the upper-left part of Type C of the commercial. Congrats again on your 1st anniversary!”

このイラストも音街ウナのCMでチラッと映ってた(*´ω｀*) pic.twitter.com/UQRUBuZbyJ

— mi_ma@JPOPｶｳﾞｧｰ祭り参加 (@ouzy43) November 12, 2017

“I caught of glimpse of this here illustration appearing in the Otomachi Una commercial (*´ω｀*)”

私もみんなの真似しに来ました！

タイプBです！ありがとうございました〜！（音街ウナCM） pic.twitter.com/1PeUbV4tWJ

— すーばー?? (@su_ba_unatyan) November 12, 2017

“My artwork joined in, too! It’s in Type B! Thank you so much~! (Otomachi Una commercial)

音街ウナちゃんのCM公開されたみたいです私のイラストはタイプCの左側にいます♪拙いイラストなのに?凄く嬉しいですっっ??有難うございました！！#音街ウナ #テレビCM
音街ウナTVCM「おかげさまで1周年」3タイプ https://t.co/EHOkJ4No96 @YouTubeさんから pic.twitter.com/H6su4i5a9s

— 間 早菜木 (@AidaSanaki) November 11, 2017

“It seems like Otomachi Una’s commercial is now online My illustration is on the left side of Type C♪ even though it’s a pretty shoddy piece of work? This make me so incredibly happy?? Thank you so much!!”

The post Otomachi Una TV Commercial Now on YouTube! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open!
item.dc:creator: R3van
item.description:
The first eel-themed VOCALOID Otomachi Una now has an official online shop where fans can get some unique goodies! Currently, the selection is quite limited, with only keychains and huge stuffed hats being sold, but there will likely be more variety later on. All of the items feature Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex! …

The post Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The first eel-themed VOCALOID Otomachi Una now has an official online shop where fans can get some unique goodies! Currently, the selection is quite limited, with only keychains and huge stuffed hats being sold, but there will likely be more variety later on. All of the items feature Una’s three voicebanks: Sugar, Spicy, and Talk Ex!

The Goods

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar, Spicy, Talk Ex): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Sugar): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Spicy): ¥700($6 USD) (including tax)

Acrylic Keychain (Talk Ex): ¥700($6 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Sugar): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Spicy): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Stuffed Hat (Talk Ex): ¥3,980($35 USD)(including tax)

Where to Buy

All of these goods are available for immediate purchase on Otomachi Una’s online shop here! Shipping costs ¥700($6 USD) per order. However, those living outside of Japan will have to use a forwarder/proxy service.

Otomachi Una’s Twitter also announced that those who friend Una’s LINE account and send them a message saying “グッズクーポン” can take advantage of a coupon for orders over ¥1,000($9 USD)! You can find and scan their QR code here!

?【お知らせ】音街ウナのオフィシャルグッズショップ（ネットショップ）がオープンしました♪?
?LINE＠でお得なクーポンもあります♪??
?よろしくおねがいします♪є(๑´◎`)๑_ _))ﾍﾟｺﾘ????‍https://t.co/sJs8cNwE1o pic.twitter.com/mBQ2JeDNuz

— 音街ウナ公式?11/3超パーティー? (@otomachiuna) October 25, 2017

 

Sources: Vocaloid Buy Blog, Otomachi Una Twitter

The post Otomachi Una Official Online Shop is Now Open! appeared first on VNN.
